response.overview: A familyâ€™s trip to rural Arkansas takes a sinister turn when they stumble upon a backwoods revival unlike any other. What begins as a curious glimpse into small-town faith soon spirals into chaos as devotion turns violent and belief gives way to bloodshed. Trapped among zealots who see salvation in sacrifice, the family must confront a terrifying force that blurs the line between the divine and the demonic. In this haunting descent into madness, faith, fear, and fanaticism fuse into unrelenting horror.
response.title: The Anointed
